{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netopia |model=3347NWG |revision=-006 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=12/2005 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Thailand |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=GZ53347NWG |ic_id=2525A-3347NWG |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7300A;TNETD7300AGDW, 6IA20YW; |cpu1_cspeed=160 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032M10TFIR4 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S281632F-TC75 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130;TNETW1130GVF, 5CP1508 D4; |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=RC2422B |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RT0547 P11, 761366 5A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=0 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0F:CC |oui_eth= }} Invalid FCC ID. Device has an internal MMCX connector which is connected to the external antenna.
The default SSID seems to start with "3347 " and is then followed by a 4 digit number (on at least some units).
== Images from a 3347NWG-006 == <gallery> File:Netopia 3347nwg board top.jpg|top of the board File:Netopia_3347nwg_board_top_shields_removed.jpg|top of the board with RF shields removed File:Netopia_3347nwg_board_bot.jpg|bottom of the board </gallery> [[Has images::internal| ]]
